info.title: Riot API
info.description:
OpenAPI/Swagger version of the [Riot API](https://developer.riotgames.com/). Automatically generated daily.
## Download OpenAPI Spec File
The following versions of the Riot API spec file are available:
- `openapi-3.0.0.json` ([download file](../openapi-3.0.0.json), [view ui](?openapi-3.0.0.json))
- `openapi-3.0.0.min.json` ([download file](../openapi-3.0.0.min.json), [view ui](?openapi-3.0.0.min.json))
- `openapi-3.0.0.yml` ([download file](../openapi-3.0.0.yml), [view ui](?openapi-3.0.0.yml))
- `openapi-3.0.0.min.yml` ([download file](../openapi-3.0.0.min.yml), [view ui](?openapi-3.0.0.min.yml))
- `swaggerspec-2.0.json` ([download file](../swaggerspec-2.0.json), [view ui](?swaggerspec-2.0.json))
- `swaggerspec-2.0.min.json` ([download file](../swaggerspec-2.0.min.json), [view ui](?swaggerspec-2.0.min.json))
- `swaggerspec-2.0.yml` ([download file](../swaggerspec-2.0.yml), [view ui](?swaggerspec-2.0.yml))
- `swaggerspec-2.0.min.yml` ([download file](../swaggerspec-2.0.min.yml), [view ui](?swaggerspec-2.0.min.yml))
## Source Code
Source code on [GitHub](https://github.com/MingweiSamuel/riotapi-schema). Pull requests welcome!
## Automatically Generated
Rebuilt on [Travis CI](https://travis-ci.org/MingweiSamuel/riotapi-schema/builds) daily.
***

get.summary: Retrieves champion list
get.description:
Retrieves champion list
## Implementation Notes
Not all data specified below is returned by default. See the tags parameter for more information.
## Rate Limit Notes
Requests to this API are not counted against the application Rate Limits.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Patch version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, key, name, and title are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

parameters.name: dataById
parameters.description: If specified as true, the returned data map will use the champions' IDs as the keys. If not specified or specified as false, the returned data map will use the champions' keys instead.

get.summary: Get matchlist for games played on given account ID and platform ID and filtered using given filter parameters, if any.

422.description: Player exists, but hasn't played since match history collection began

get.description:
Get matchlist for games played on given account ID and platform ID and filtered using given filter parameters, if any.
## Implementation Notes
A number of optional parameters are provided for filtering. It is up to the caller to ensure that the combination of filter parameters provided is valid for the requested account, otherwise, no matches may be returned.

If beginIndex is specified, but not endIndex, then endIndex defaults to beginIndex+100. If endIndex is specified, but not beginIndex, then beginIndex defaults to 0. If both are specified, then endIndex must be greater than beginIndex. The maximum range allowed is 100, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

If beginTime is specified, but not endTime, then these parameters are ignored. If endTime is specified, but not beginTime, then beginTime defaults to the start of the account's match history. If both are specified, then endTime should be greater than beginTime. The maximum time range allowed is one week, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID.

parameters.name: queue
parameters.description: Set of queue IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end time to use for filtering matchlist specified as epoch milliseconds. If beginTime is specified, but not endTime, then these parameters are ignored. If endTime is specified, but not beginTime, then beginTime defaults to the start of the account's match history. If both are specified, then endTime should be greater than beginTime. The maximum time range allowed is one week, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

parameters.name: beginIndex
parameters.description: The begin index to use for filtering matchlist.  If beginIndex is specified, but not endIndex, then endIndex defaults to beginIndex+100. If endIndex is specified, but not beginIndex, then beginIndex defaults to 0. If both are specified, then endIndex must be greater than beginIndex. The maximum range allowed is 100, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

parameters.name: beginTime
parameters.description: The begin time to use for filtering matchlist specified as epoch milliseconds. If beginTime is specified, but not endTime, then these parameters are ignored. If endTime is specified, but not beginTime, then beginTime defaults to the start of the account's match history. If both are specified, then endTime should be greater than beginTime. The maximum time range allowed is one week, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Set of season IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

parameters.name: champion
parameters.description: Set of champion IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

parameters.name: endIndex
parameters.description: The end index to use for filtering matchlist. If beginIndex is specified, but not endIndex, then endIndex defaults to beginIndex+100. If endIndex is specified, but not beginIndex, then beginIndex defaults to 0. If both are specified, then endIndex must be greater than beginIndex. The maximum range allowed is 100, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

champion-mastery-v3.ChampionMasteryDTO.title: ChampionMasteryDTO
champion-mastery-v3.ChampionMasteryDTO.description: This object contains single Champion Mastery information for player and champion combination.

chestGranted.description: Is chest granted for this champion or not in current season.

championLevel.description: Champion level for specified player and champion combination.

championPoints.description: Total number of champion points for this player and champion combination - they are used to determine championLevel.

championPointsUntilNextLevel.description: Number of points needed to achieve next level. Zero if player reached maximum champion level for this champion.

championPointsSinceLastLevel.description: Number of points earned since current level has been achieved. Zero if player reached maximum champion level for this champion.

lastPlayTime.description: Last time this champion was played by this player - in Unix milliseconds time format.

champion-v3.ChampionListDto.title: ChampionListDto
champion-v3.ChampionListDto.description: This object contains a collection of champion information.

botMmEnabled.description: Bot Match Made enabled flag (for Co-op vs. AI games).

active.description: Indicates if the champion is active.

freeToPlay.description: Indicates if the champion is free to play. Free to play champions are rotated periodically.

id.description: Champion ID. For static information correlating to champion IDs, please refer to the LoL Static Data API.

lg.description: Legacy script mode for IE6 or older.

dd.description: Latest changed version of Dragon Magic.

n.description: Latest changed version for each data type listed.

profileiconmax.description: Special behavior number identifying the largest profile icon ID that can be used under 500. Any profile icon that is requested between this number and 500 should be mapped to 0.

store.description: Additional API data drawn from other sources that may be related to Data Dragon functionality.

v.description: Current version of this file for this realm.

css.description: Latest changed version of Dragon Magic's CSS file.

masteries-v3.MasteryPageDto.title: MasteryPageDto
masteries-v3.MasteryPageDto.description: This object contains mastery page information.

current.description: Indicates if the mastery page is the current mastery page.

masteries.description: Collection of masteries associated with the mastery page.

id.description: Mastery ID. For static information correlating to masteries, please refer to the LoL Static Data API.

rank.description: Mastery rank (i.e., the number of points put into this mastery).

type.description: (Legal values:  CHAMPION_KILL,  WARD_PLACED,  WARD_KILL,  BUILDING_KILL,  ELITE_MONSTER_KILL,  ITEM_PURCHASED,  ITEM_SOLD,  ITEM_DESTROYED,  ITEM_UNDO,  SKILL_LEVEL_UP,  ASCENDED_EVENT,  CAPTURE_POINT,  PORO_KING_SUMMON)

runes-v3.RunePagesDto.title: RunePagesDto
runes-v3.RunePagesDto.description: This object contains rune pages information.

pages.description: Collection of rune pages associated with the summoner.

runes-v3.RunePageDto.title: RunePageDto
runes-v3.RunePageDto.description: This object contains rune page information.

current.description: Indicates if the page is the current page.

slots.description: Collection of rune slots associated with the rune page.

runes-v3.RuneSlotDto.title: RuneSlotDto
runes-v3.RuneSlotDto.description: This object contains rune slot information.

runeId.description: Rune ID associated with the rune slot. For static information correlating to rune IDs, please refer to the LoL Static Data API.

gameStartTime.description: The game start time represented in epoch milliseconds

platformId.description: The ID of the platform on which the game is being played

gameLength.description: The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the game started

gameQueueConfigId.description: The queue type (queue types are documented on the Game Constants page)

pickTurn.description: The turn during which the champion was banned

championId.description: The ID of the banned champion

teamId.description: The ID of the team that banned the champion

encryptionKey.description: Key used to decrypt the spectator grid game data for playback

profileIconId.description: The ID of the profile icon used by this participant

championId.description: The ID of the champion played by this participant

summonerName.description: The summoner name of this participant

runes.description: The runes used by this participant

bot.description: Flag indicating whether or not this participant is a bot

teamId.description: The team ID of this participant, indicating the participant's team

spell2Id.description: The ID of the second summoner spell used by this participant

masteries.description: The masteries used by this participant

spell1Id.description: The ID of the first summoner spell used by this participant

summonerId.description: The summoner ID of this participant

count.description: The count of this rune used by the participant

rank.description: The number of points put into this mastery by the user

clientRefreshInterval.description: The suggested interval to wait before requesting FeaturedGames again

gameStartTime.description: The game start time represented in epoch milliseconds

platformId.description: The ID of the platform on which the game is being played

gameLength.description: The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the game started

gameQueueConfigId.description: The queue type (queue types are documented on the Game Constants page)

profileIconId.description: The ID of the profile icon used by this participant

championId.description: The ID of the champion played by this participant

summonerName.description: The summoner name of this participant

bot.description: Flag indicating whether or not this participant is a bot

spell2Id.description: The ID of the second summoner spell used by this participant

teamId.description: The team ID of this participant, indicating the participant's team

spell1Id.description: The ID of the first summoner spell used by this participant

profileIconId.description: ID of the summoner icon associated with the summoner.

summonerLevel.description: Summoner level associated with the summoner.

revisionDate.description: Date summoner was last modified specified as epoch milliseconds. The following events will update this timestamp: profile icon change, playing the tutorial or advanced tutorial, finishing a game, summoner name change

spectatorType.description:
The spectator type of the game.
             (Legal values:  NONE,  LOBBYONLY,  ALL)

teamSize.description: The team size of the game. Valid values are 1-5.

pickType.description:
The pick type of the game.
             (Legal values:  BLIND_PICK,  DRAFT_MODE,  ALL_RANDOM,  TOURNAMENT_DRAFT)

allowedSummonerIds.description: Optional list of participants in order to validate the players eligible to join the lobby. NOTE: We currently do not enforce participants at the team level, but rather the aggregate of teamOne and teamTwo. We may add the ability to enforce at the team level in the future.

mapType.description:
The map type of the game.
             (Legal values:  SUMMONERS_RIFT,  TWISTED_TREELINE,  HOWLING_ABYSS)

metadata.description: Optional string that may contain any data in any format, if specified at all. Used to denote any custom information about the game.

eventType.description: The type of event that was triggered

summonerId.description: The summoner that triggered the event

url.description: The provider's callback URL to which tournament game results in this region should be posted. The URL must be well-formed, use the http or https protocol, and use the default port for the protocol (http URLs must use port 80, https URLs must use port 443).

region.description:
The region in which the provider will be running tournaments.
             (Legal values:  BR,  EUNE,  EUW,  JP,  LAN,  LAS,  NA,  OCE,  PBE,  RU,  TR)

providerId.description: The provider ID to specify the regional registered provider data to associate this tournament.

name.description: The optional name of the tournament.

spectatorType.description:
The spectator type of the game.
             (Legal values:  NONE,  LOBBYONLY,  ALL)

teamSize.description: The team size of the game. Valid values are 1-5.

pickType.description:
The pick type of the game.
             (Legal values:  BLIND_PICK,  DRAFT_MODE,  ALL_RANDOM,  TOURNAMENT_DRAFT)

allowedSummonerIds.description: Optional list of participants in order to validate the players eligible to join the lobby. NOTE: We currently do not enforce participants at the team level, but rather the aggregate of teamOne and teamTwo. We may add the ability to enforce at the team level in the future.

mapType.description:
The map type of the game.
             (Legal values:  SUMMONERS_RIFT,  TWISTED_TREELINE,  HOWLING_ABYSS)

metadata.description: Optional string that may contain any data in any format, if specified at all. Used to denote any custom information about the game.

spectatorType.description:
The spectator type
             (Legal values:  NONE,  LOBBYONLY,  ALL)

pickType.description:
The pick type
             (Legal values:  BLIND_PICK,  DRAFT_MODE,  ALL_RANDOM,  TOURNAMENT_DRAFT)

allowedParticipants.description: Comma separated list of summoner Ids

mapType.description:
The map type
             (Legal values:  SUMMONERS_RIFT,  TWISTED_TREELINE,  HOWLING_ABYSS)

map.description: The game map for the tournament code game

spectators.description: The spectator mode for the tournament code game.

region.description:
The tournament code's region.
             (Legal values:  BR,  EUNE,  EUW,  JP,  LAN,  LAS,  NA,  OCE,  PBE,  RU,  TR)

teamSize.description: The team size for the tournament code game.

pickType.description: The pick mode for tournament code game.

lobbyName.description: The lobby name for the tournament code game.

password.description: The password for the tournament code game.

eventType.description: The type of event that was triggered

summonerId.description: The summoner that triggered the event

url.description: The provider's callback URL to which tournament game results in this region should be posted. The URL must be well-formed, use the http or https protocol, and use the default port for the protocol (http URLs must use port 80, https URLs must use port 443).

region.description:
The region in which the provider will be running tournaments.
             (Legal values:  BR,  EUNE,  EUW,  JP,  LAN,  LAS,  NA,  OCE,  PBE,  RU,  TR)

providerId.description: The provider ID to specify the regional registered provider data to associate this tournament.

name.description: The optional name of the tournament.
